TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to save crash record successfully.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Casualty Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Casualty Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Casualty Tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'Add New' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'Add New' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'Add New' button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter Injury Reference No.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter Injury Reference No.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter Injury Reference No.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter Vehicle Reference No.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter Vehicle Reference No.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter Vehicle Reference No.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select Casualty Class.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select Casualty Class.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select Casualty Class.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'Validate and Save' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'Validate and Save' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'Validate and Save' button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'I Agree' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'I Agree' button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'I Agree' button.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify toast message - 'The record was saved successfully'.Capture screenshot.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message - 'The record was saved successfully'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message - 'The record was saved successfully'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message - 'The record was saved successfully'.
